metadata.title: Antimicrobial prescribing in Australian hospitals; antimicrobial choice and indications for inappropriate prescribing

abstract.original_text: Propensity-score matched analysis comparing clinical benefits of antimicrobial de-escalation and non-switch in adults with community-onset monomicrobial Escherichia coli, Klebsiella species, and Proteus mirabilis bacteremia
